description.zh: PagePlug 是一个开源的、声明式的、可视化的前端低代码框架，可以用来制作 Web 应用、H5应用等。与市面上其他的低代码（轻流、宜搭、微搭、简道云、轻流、活字格等等）面向的非编程人员使用场景不同，PagePlug 这款低代码产品是面向 Developers 研发人群使用的，它旨在加速开发人员的开发过程，内部系统、工具的开发更简单。
description.en: PagePlug is an open-source, declarative, and visual low-code front-end framework for creating web applications, H5 applications, and more. Unlike other low-code frameworks on the market (such as LightFlow, Yida, Weida, Jiandaoyun, LightFlow, and Huozige, etc.) which are geared towards non-programmers, PagePlug is designed for developers. It aims to accelerate the development process and simplify the development of internal systems and tools.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势

- 基于 Appsmith 做了整体汉化及性能优化，体验变得更好了
- 更快捷简单的图表解决方案
- 集成表单解决方案领域的佼佼者
## 功能特色

- 更强大的可视化建模工具
- 更广泛的 API 支持
- 更完善的数据管理功能
- 更强大的扩展性
- 更好的安全性支持
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Based on Appsmith, with overall localization and performance optimization for a better user experience
- A faster and simpler charting solution
- A leader in integrated form solutions
# Features

- More powerful visual modeling tools
- Wider API support
- More comprehensive data management functions
- Greater scalability
- Better security support
